ygData.subject: Blackstorm &  Maxima
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima only watched Kitkat. She was annoyed more or less with the Predacon. Curious as to who placed her in charge. Again, she was very similar to Starscream.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima only watched Kitkat. She was annoyed more or less with the Predacon. 
Curious as to who placed her in charge. Again, she was very similar to 
Starscream. Those who grabbed too much power & openly spoke of it, eventually 
found a quick demise. This was fact & observation, not her own beliefs. She 
never wanted command, even though she wanted to be Megatron's 2nd in command, 
commanding others was not her priority, it was being Megatron's best of the 
best that mattered most to her. That ideal & way of conduct actually got her 
places. 

She turned to Blackstorm. "Now... pardon for the interruption. Things of this 
sort will happen. However, fighting til each of us are terminated or heavily 
damaged is not a way of existing any more. Nor have I that power to attempt 
that."

"Kitkat had some truth. Skills in hand to hand is important. Example... the 
old battles between Megatron & Optimus Prime... or any other old comrade of 
mine & our enemies the Autobots. There will be close combat. That's a 
guarantee."

She leaned back against the console again, crossing her arms. "However, one 
needs to know their limits & their abilities in order to hone in their 
skills. Know your weapons. The weapons you have is important. They are highly 
effective at the right time. Useless in other situations. Cunning.. 
strategy.. tact.... intelligence... these are important as well. Loyalty is a 
factor. Know what you are fighting for. Know your comrades as to who you can 
trust & who you cannot. Know your comrades as well as your enemies, their 
skills.. their weapons."

Standing she started to pace towards Blackstorm in a confident waltz, 
"Importantly, the importance of the Decepticons & the cause far exceeds your 
personal vendetas. never forget that, Blackstorm. The cause is your first 
priority. Everything else... can wait." 


--part1_76.2ce8e537.2bd9f4a0_boundary
